short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize your sound and elevate your browsing experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Crafted by the team behind the #1 hearing test app, Mimi Chrome extension tunes sound to your unique hearing. By enhancing clarity and audibility, it transforms your browser auditory journey.

Whether you're an audiophile, dealing with hearing impairments or looking for a richer audio, Mimi opens the door to a more detailed and captivating sound in your browser.

Immerse yourself in music, movies, and games on YouTube and other streaming websites without needing to crank up the volume.

Our story
In a world of one-sound-fits-all, we asked, 'What if we could make personal sound accessible for everyone?' Mimi for Chrome was our answer! We have taken the power of our patented testing, fitting, and audio processing technology and packed it into a sleek easy-to-use browser extension.

Features
ðŸ”‘ Login with Mimi Hearing ID: Unlock full personalization by logging in with your Mimi Hearing ID. Create your profile after taking a quick hearing assessment in the iOS Mimi Hearing Test app. Your Hearing ID is your VIP pass to a concert where the sound is tuned just for you.

ðŸ“Š Quick age-based personalization: No time to test your ears? No worries! Our Mimi-magic algorithms, backed by almost 4 million hearing profiles, will adapt sound to you based on your age. A better sounding web experience is only a few clicks away.

ðŸŽ› Fine-tune: Our intuitive controls let you customize the sound to your taste or use case. 'Recommended' or 'Richer' or 'Softer'? The choice is in your hands. 

ðŸš€ Popular services support: While we're working on expanding the list of supported websites, you can already enjoy your personalized sound on YouTube and other streaming platforms (please visit our website to view the full list).

Fuel our progress
This extension may not be as stable as our main product lineup. There might be compatibility issues with other audio-related extensions (e.g. EQ) installed in your browser. 
We appreciate your feedback as it helps us improve and provide you with an even better experience. Together, let's elevate the world of sound! 
For more details, please visit https://mimi.io/chrome-extension
